subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Alpine Skiing
lead_paragraph: There are no plans by the United States ski team to reintroduce its “Best in the World” marketing, but Saturday the team was enjoying the fruits of a successful philosophical restructuring.
snippet: There are no plans by the United States ski team to reintroduce its “Best in the World” marketing, but Saturday the team was enjoying the fruits of a successful philosophical restructuring.
